paragraph.emphasis:
Key C: Species of the
Sphex bohemanni
group

paragraph.keyLead:
2. Cellular wing area with yellow tinge (Fig. 93) ................................
S. pseudopraedator
sp. nov.
– Cellular wing area more or less fuscous, without yellow tinge..................................................3

4. Free clypeal margin black; mandible black with dark ferruginous stripe only in center ( Fig. 15 ) ..........................................................................................................
S. abbotti abbotti W. Fox, 1891

6. Free clypeal margin black; mandible black with dark ferruginous stripe only in center ( Fig. 17 ) ...........................................................................................................
S. abyssinicus ( Arnold, 1928 )

7. Petiole length about 2× its medial width .......................................
S. abbotti nivarius
subsp. nov.

– Petiole length at most 1.7× its medial width .................
S. schoutedeni schoutedeni Kohl, 1913

S. abbotti abbotti W. Fox, 1891
